{{Description|A sharp-eyed and proud glede.<br />A bird of prey that nests in the treetops among the lofty mountain peaks. Legend holds that this bird forever roams the clouds, never setting foot on land to nest, but this is a mere product of ignorant fantasy on the one hand and fanciful imagination on the other. Even the Lapis Glede must fight to eat its fill and protect its young.|in-game description from the [[Archive]]}}
'''Lapis Glede''' is a type of [[Falcons|falcon]] which can be found as a [[Wildlife]].

Falcons are usually found in places with high altitude and are continuously flying in a round path.

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|2}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Can be found flying around the top of the mountain in the biggest island of [[Guyun Stone Forest]], and flying around above a small island in the south of [[Guyun Stone Forest]].
